async app.main.create_admin(admin: CreateAdmin, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_async_db))¶

Create a new admin.

Args:

admin (CreateAdmin): The admin data to be created. db (AsyncSession, optional): The async database session. Defaults to Depends(get_async_db).

Returns:

dict: A dictionary containing a success message if the admin is created successfully.

Raises:

HTTPException: If there is an error creating the admin.
